title: Comfort and Luxury on San Felipe
posting_body: For leasing info call or text
Comfort and Luxury on San Felipe
The community redefines luxury living in Houston with its community of upscale apartments and amenities.
Combined with an ideal location near The Galleria, you won’t want to live anywhere else.
Come home to a grand floor plan with cherry hardwood floors, sophisticated archways and crown molding.
While kitchens feature premium finishes, bedrooms incorporate comfort and convenience in every detail.
Relaxation extends beyond your apartment with an outstanding amenity package.
Relax and unwind by the palm-lined pool or mingle in the social lounge with an al fresco dining space.
Two Story Fitness Center with Cardio Center and Free Weights
